title: World Rugby investigating picture of referee Jaco Peyper jokingly re-enacting Sebastien Vahaamahina elbow
text:
World Rugby has confirmed that it is looking into a photo of South African referee Jaco Peyper posing with a group of Wales fans following Wales’s victory over France on Sunday in which he appears to be jokingly re-enacting the elbow to the head for which he sent off Sebastien Vahaamahina.

The vice-president of the French rugby federation, Serge Simon, has already demanded an explanation.

Vahaamahina struck Aaron Wainwright on the jaw during an attacking maul in Wales’s dramatic 20-19 win, giving Peyper no choice but to send him off.

But the South African has now invited controversy...
